com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.abilities

Class BaseAbilityPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.abilities.BaseAbilityPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbilityPlugin, EveryFrameScript
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseDurationAbility, BaseToggleAbility

    public abstract class BaseAbilityPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbilityPlugin, EveryFrameScript
